question.title: Group Employees of the Same Salary
question.translatedTitle: 将工资相同的雇员分组
question.metaData: {"mysql":["Create table If Not Exists Employees (employee_id int, name varchar(30), salary int)"],"mssql":["Create table Employees (employee_id int, name varchar(30), salary int)"],"oraclesql":["Create table Employees (employee_id int, name varchar(30), salary int)"],"database":true,"name":"employees_of_same_salary","pythondata":["Employees = pd.DataFrame([], columns=['employee_id', 'name', 'salary']).astype({'employee_id':'Int64', 'name':'object', 'salary':'Int64'})"],"postgresql":["Create table If Not Exists Employees (employee_id int, name varchar(30), salary int)"],"database_schema":{"Employees":{"employee_id":"INT","name":"VARCHAR(30)","salary":"INT"}}}
